p: Using an automated system (QBC Autoread Plus, United Kingdom), the whole blood collected in EDTA tubes was used to determine the following haematological parameters: white blood cells (WBCs), red blood cells (RBCs), hematocrit (Hct), Platelets (Plt), Haemoglobin (Hgb), Mean corpuscular haemoglobin (MCH), Mean corpuscular haemoglobin concentration (MCHC), Mean corpuscular volume (MCV),Granulocytes (Gran), Lymphocytes (Lym), mean platelet volume (MPV), mid-cells (Mid).
